The investigator randomize 256 subject , newly admit post acute care , intervention ( RESERVE-DSD ) control ( usual care ) . Intervention subject receive 30-minute session tailor cognitively stimulating recreational activity 30 day . The investigator hypothesize subject receive RESERVE-DSD : decreased severity duration delirium ; great gain attention , orientation , memory , abstract thinking , executive functioning ; great gain physical function compare subject DSD receive usual care . The investigator also evaluate potential moderator intervention efficacy ( lifetime complex mental activity APOE status ) . The secondary aim describe cost associate RESERVE-DSD .
